text: Death Becomes Her is a 1992 American fantasy and dark comedy movie. This movie is about a couple of childish rivals drinking a magic potion which promises eternal youth. Goldie Hawn plays Helen Sharp. Meryl Streep plays Madeline. Bruce Willis and Isabella Rossellini also star in the movie. The movie received mixed reviews. It made over $149 million. == Other websites == * Category:1992 fantasy movies Category:1992 comedy movies Category:1990s fantasy-comedy movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in the future Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about actors Category:Movies about revenge Category:Infidelity in movies Category:Narcissism in fiction Category:Movies directed by Robert Zemeckis Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Death Becomes Her
